here & there

wednesday 07.15.20

Minimal Days

Minimal Days ☁️ is a simple, minimalistic Jekyll theme for displaying blog posts in a single-column layout.

Features

  • Mobile-friendly design
  • Pagination, tags, responsive images through plugins
  • Optional hidden ‘About’ page via header image

Visit the README to learn more!

Source

Take a peek at the GitHub repository.

Have a lovely, minimal day! ☁️
